title: need 1 player for rank team ward skin
body:
need 1 player for rank team, your choice of position, we hv 1 diamond, 1 plat and 2 gold player now

we need just one more and it could be you!

we would be playing around tmr 06/11/2015 1pm 

leave your summonor's name on a comment below 

we look forward to have you for some fun game

replies.body:
Thatsbs
(been playing since the beta, never played in a team really)

IGN: MrScavenge
Rank: Gold 5
Role: Top/Mid
Main Champions: Irelia, Cho, Wukong, Fizz, Hecarim, Lux, Vlad
TeamSpeak, Skype, Curse : Yes
noddy01 and noddy011 on both today
